author: AAA3A
name: Recipes
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. If you like my work, please consider donating on my [Buy Me a Coffee page](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aaa3a>)!
short: A cog to search and show a cooking recipe!
description: A cog to search and show a cooking recipe!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
